reviews.text: we stayed at the thomas luny for 3 nights with our family, We booked all four of the bedrooms for the occassion of a family wedding held locally. On arrival our daughters were offered tea and cake which was so thoughtful and a added sense of being made very welcome. We arrived early evening and were welcomed with the same warm welcome.
reviews.title: wonderful relaxing quality guest house

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: although a guest house you are able to come and go without feeling awkward.
reviews.title: A great base from which to tour

reviews.text: The rooms are spacious and immaculate, bathrooms are equally clean and immaculate. ample hot water.
reviews.title: Peaceful and top class quality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfasts are great with good choice of fresh fruit, cheeses and homemade bread.
reviews.title: perfectly positioned for the centre of Teignmouth
One of the best
reviews.text: John & Alison are wonderful hosts and everything they do is with such attention to detail

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Alison was extremely welcoming and the house has a lot of character. The value for money is outstanding - I've paid close to twice what we paid here for equivalent accommodation in other parts of the UK. For evening meals, The Owl And The Pussycat nearby is excellent - don't be put of by the rather custesy name.
reviews.title: Extremely hospitable and great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked a six night stay on the basis of recommendations and five stars and we were certainly not disappointed. Alison and John are charming hosts and we were very well looked after in a lovely house. The rooms were spotlessly clean, a really good choice at breakfast, and afternoon tea (included in the cost) a delight. We can certainly recommend Thomas Luny House, and hopefully, will make a return visit.
reviews.title: Super place to stay in Teignmouth

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely hosts who were there when required, excellent accommodation with all that is needed at good value within easy reach of the town and first class restaurants like the Owl and the pussycat. We will be back and will recommend friends when they are in the area,
reviews.title: What a great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owners are quietly attentative to their guests' requirements, greeting and providing an excellent tea/coffee tray with homemade cakes every afternoon / early evening in the beautiful guest drawing room, without invading one's personal space. Breakfast is excellent with lovely table settings. Nothing is too much - beautiful fresh flowers in a well-appointed, large, airy but warm room with large fluffy towels (and quality towelling bathrobe), good quality soaps, shampoos and moisturiser. Fresh milk is also provided in the room. Teignmouth is my own home town and it felt like I was back at home. Good log fire too. Spacious parking area too.
reviews.title: Elegant, luxurious, yet homely relaxation

reviews.text: A wonderful experience. Bit expensive as a solo visitor, but rather one night there than two anywhere else. Charming hosts, caring but not overbearing and with wonderful attention to detail. Now looking for an excuse to return.
reviews.title: Bliss

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only stayed one night, wished we had the time to stay longer! Truely top class hosting, very friendly, corteus people We could not have wished for better service. We received a warm welcome, and were made to feel immedaitely at home. Sitting drinking tea by the open fire in the sittng room was a lovely treat.
reviews.title: Charming, tranquil, top class & friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everywhere was very clean, and although first impressions were that the decor was a bit "chinzy", it was totally in keeping with the beauiful house. We had a huuuuuge bed, which was so comfortable, we didnt want to get up! I'm glad we did - if just for the breakfast!
reviews.title: Fantastic place stay - Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I could wax lyrial about the amazing breakfast, save to say, it was cooked to perfection, and the ingredients were top quality.
reviews.title: Five Star in every way!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A bit on the pricey side, but worth every single penny - we will dffinately be returning when we are in that part of the world again!
reviews.title: A wonderful house with fantastic hosts.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have stayed here before and found it to be as perfect as it was a few years ago .
reviews.title: Everything we could have hoped for - and more

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here with my husband overnight on a visit to Teignmouth. Hosts made us feel very welcome. We were treated with a cup of tea and a lovely slice of cake on arrival. Stayed in the Thomas Luny room, a spacious room with large bed, all spotlessly clean. Lots of helpful information on restaurants and places to visit in the room. Delicious breakfast cooked to order in the morning.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel with good attention to detail

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A really lovely B&B, though to call it a B&B hardly does it justice. It's an elegant house, and yet we didn't feel out of place after a week of walking along the South West Coast Path. Our room was wonderful, the service fantastic, and the breakfast brilliant.
reviews.title: A really special place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thomas Luny House has won many awards, and once you've stayed there, you'll understand why. I can't wait for an excuse to go back.
reviews.title: Felt at home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What exceptional hospitality we were made to feel very welcome.
reviews.title: Such wonderful attention to detail

reviews.text: Great breakfasts and lovely cake in the afternoon no good for your waistline!! what more could you wish for.
reviews.title: Excellent B & B
